title: Energy Efficient College Building
subtitle: Planning, analysis, design & energy optimisation
summary: Designed an energy-efficient G+2 educational building using advanced BIM workflows including site study, planning, structural analysis, energy optimisation, estimation, and visualisation.
highlights: Developed a complete BIM model as a single source of truth.|Optimised building energy performance using simulations.|Followed NBC, KMBR and relevant IS codes.|Generated coordinated drawings, schedules and estimates.

title: A Visionary Smart City
subtitle: Urban-scale BIM concept design
summary: Conceptual smart city design using BIM tools focusing on zoning, planning, and sustainable infrastructure.
highlights: Prepared conceptual BIM models for urban planning.|Explored sustainable infrastructure layouts.|Created city-level visualisations.

title: Commercial Building – BIM Design
subtitle: Complete BIM workflow for a commercial project
summary: Designed a commercial building using BIM tools with detailed modelling, drawings, and visualisation.
highlights: Created detailed BIM models.|Generated coordinated drawings.|Produced realistic renders.

title: Residential Building Designs (Revit)
subtitle: Multiple house design models
summary: Series of residential house design projects using Revit and Enscape for modelling and visualisation.
highlights: Developed multiple parametric Revit models.|Prepared drawings and schedules.|Created walkthroughs and renders.
